verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: Behind closed doors at his FEMA briefing] , [ARG0: President Trump] [V: ditched] [ARG1: talk of Puerto Rico] and instead shared his optimism about North Korea summit and boasted he saved billions replacing Air Force One .
